text: Hi <@U057DHLS75W> sorry about that I was interviewing for a new Sr. Developer role and I've been offline for over a month hehe. I crushed it btw I am working for them now. should have some time in the evenings to chill with the community. I hope you are doing great, and glad you figured it out !!!

`let answers = [];`

`// For a single file upload field`
`let singleFileUploadObj = {};`
`singleFileUploadObj.name = "fieldname"; // Replace 'fieldname' with the actual name of your file upload field`
`singleFileUploadObj.value = File; // File is the actual file object from the input field`
`answers.push(singleFileUploadObj);`

`// For multiple file uploads (assuming you have multiple file input fields)`
`let multiFileUploadObjs = [];`

`// Loop through each file input field`
`document.querySelectorAll('input[type="file"]').forEach(inputElement => {`
  `let file = inputElement.files[0]; // Assuming you're only allowing one file per input`
  `let multiFileUploadObj = {};`
  `multiFileUploadObj.name = inputElement.name; // Use the input's name attribute as the field name`
  `multiFileUploadObj.value = file;`
  `multiFileUploadObjs.push(multiFileUploadObj);`
`});`

`answers = answers.concat(multiFileUploadObjs);`
